name: Race the Sun (itch) (nicorm)
description: A simple endless runner I made for my final assignment in "Basic VideoGame Programming", you've got your car and an endless road to a get as maximum score as possible. It was the first time I added songs to my C++, I got some nice tunes for the game. I am getting my hands on C++ console games first so I can understand better the language and after go fdor Unreal Engine! So good luck and I hope you like it ;)
